Each page lists headlines organized into topic sections.
Each section has links for "full quotes" for each summary headline.

The web site is organized into the following groups of political leaders:


Political leaders (presidential candidates, plus opinion leaders).

That list is broken down (scroll to below) into current candidates, past presidents, opinion leaders, and others.

The rest of the website is organized into these sections:

Senate
: The U.S. Senate, with some previous officeholders and all of the 2002 races.

House
: The House of Representatives, with some previous officeholders and some of the 2002 races.

Governor
: Each states' governor, plus some previous officeholders and all of the 2002 races.

Cabinet
: Current Cabinet members plus some previous officeholders.
